entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
